metadata.title: Check exec tmux configured at the end of bashrc
metadata.description: Check if tmux is configured to exec at the end of bashrc.

criteria.comment: Check exec tmux configured at the end of bashrc

criterion.comment: check tmux is configured to exec on the last line of /etc/bashrc

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: check tmux is configured to exec on the last line of /etc/bashrc

ind:textfilecontent54_state.ind:subexpression:
if \[ "\$PS1" \]; then
\s+parent=\$\(ps -o ppid= -p \$\$\)
\s+name=\$\(ps -o comm= -p \$parent\)
\s+case "\$name" in sshd\|login\) exec tmux ;; esac
fi
